properties.name: open
properties.docstring: The controlled open state of the dialog.

properties.name: default_open
properties.docstring: The open state of the dialog when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

events.name: on_open_change
events.docstring: Fired when the open state changes.

DialogTrigger.name: DialogTrigger
DialogTrigger.docstring: Trigger an action or event, to open a Dialog modal.

DialogTitle.name: DialogTitle
DialogTitle.docstring: Title component to display inside a Dialog modal.

DialogContent.name: DialogContent
DialogContent.docstring: Content component to display inside a Dialog modal.

events.name: on_open_auto_focus
events.docstring: Fired when the dialog is opened.

events.name: on_close_auto_focus
events.docstring: Fired when the dialog is closed.

events.name: on_escape_key_down
events.docstring: Fired when the escape key is pressed.

events.name: on_pointer_down_outside
events.docstring: Fired when the pointer is down outside the dialog.

events.name: on_interact_outside
events.docstring: Fired when the pointer interacts outside the dialog.

DialogDescription.name: DialogDescription
DialogDescription.docstring: Description component to display inside a Dialog modal.

DialogClose.name: DialogClose
DialogClose.docstring: Close button component to close an open Dialog modal.
